clusters.title: New dinosaur species is the punk rock version of an ankylosaur
clusters.neutral_headline: Newly Discovered Dinosaur Species Resembles Ankylosaur

items.title: New dinosaur species is the punk rock version of an ankylosaur

ai_summary: A new dinosaur species, *Lokotunjia gertenbachi*, has been identified in South Africa.
The dinosaur is a type of thyreophoran, a group that includes armored dinosaurs like ankylosaurs.
*Lokotunjia* possessed a unique combination of features, including a small size and spiky armor.
Researchers believe the dinosaur lived during the Early Jurassic period, approximately 190 million years ago.
The discovery provides insights into the evolution of armored dinosaurs in the Southern Hemisphere.

clusters.title: As GM prepares to switch its EVs to NACS, it has some new adapters
clusters.neutral_headline: General Motors Prepares for EV Transition with New Adapters

items.title: As GM prepares to switch its EVs to NACS, it has some new adapters

ai_summary: General Motors will adopt the North American Charging Standard (NACS) for its electric vehicles.
GM will offer adapters allowing its EVs to charge at Tesla Supercharger stations.
The adapters will be available to GM EV owners starting in early 2024.
This move aims to expand charging options for GM EV drivers across North America.
GM plans to integrate the NACS charging port into its future EV models.

clusters.title: Unpacking Passkeys Pwned: Possibly the most specious research in decades
clusters.neutral_headline: Research on Passkeys Pwned Faces Scrutiny

items.title: Unpacking Passkeys Pwned: Possibly the most specious research in decades

ai_summary: A recent research paper, "Passkeys Pwned," has drawn criticism from security experts.
Critics question the methodology and conclusions presented in the research.
The paper examined the security of passkeys, a passwordless authentication method.
Concerns include the potential for misleading or inaccurate findings.
The research has been described as possibly flawed and lacking sufficient evidence.

items.title: Porsche adds digital keys, in-car gaming to 2026 Macan Electric

ai_summary: The 2026 Porsche Macan Electric will feature digital key functionality.
Drivers can use their smartphones to unlock and start the electric SUV.
The vehicle will include in-car gaming capabilities for entertainment.
Porsche is integrating these features to enhance the user experience.
The Macan Electric is scheduled to launch in the near future.

clusters.title: CDC director has been ousted just weeks after Senate confirmation
clusters.neutral_headline: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Director Ousted

items.title: CDC director has been ousted just weeks after Senate confirmation

ai_summary: The director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has been removed.
The director's departure occurred just weeks after Senate confirmation.
No specific reason for the ousting has been publicly announced.
The CDC is a federal agency responsible for public health protection.
The agency is now seeking a replacement for the director position.
